data.title: Mayor David Fenn
data.text:
David Fenn, a dedicated public servant, currently serves as Mayor for the City of Beaumont. As an elected official, Mayor Fenn tirelessly works towards creating a better tomorrow by serving the community, addressing key issues, and championing positive change.

Mayor Fenn has served on the City Council since 2020 and previously as a Director of the San Gorgonio Pass Water Agency. During his time on council, Mayor Fenn genuinely desires to contribute to the well-being of the community he serves through policy matters and engaging the public.

Mayor Fenn, his wife, and four sons have lived in Beaumont since 2003. David is a Real Estate Broker for two separate brokerages and has sold both new & resale homes in the Inland Empire since 1999. He also has a mortgage loan officer's license. Before this work, Mayor Fenn served in the U.S. Army for four years overseas as a Sergeant with top-secret clearance. David also has a long history of serving in his local church leadership and various youth programs.

David serves on several committees covering topics such as transportation, emergency preparedness, water alliance, and regional councils. He also volunteers his time on two veteran committees (regional and local level).

Term Information
